summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3063, for the improvement of the alley in block nine (9), Bell & Denny's Addition, being the alley extending from Vine Street to Cedar Street, between Western Avenue and First Avenue; all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 37157 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
